categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Trel Nu was a female Force-sensitive Miraluka living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum she travelled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She was assigned to the Force Enclave branch of the Alliance under Voss Mystic Sana-Rae.
Trel Nu appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as a Jedi Consular vendor inside Odessen base.
